languages.text: Из вокс-устройства вырывается короткий вдох, словно связист собирается что-то сказать... но ничего не происходит. Передачу заполняет липкая тишина. Затем — чье-то беспокойное сопение. Душерадерающий крик, рокот помех... И офицеры с ужасом замечают, что за витражами корабельного мостика виднеется лишь полотно бескрайнего космоса. "Плач королевы" незаметно растаял во тьме, забрав с собой целый отряд разведки.

traits.locale_text: Из вокс-устройства вырывается короткий вдох, словно связист собирается что-то сказать... но ничего не происходит. Передачу заполняет липкая тишина. Затем — чье-то беспокойное сопение. Душерадерающий крик, рокот помех... И офицеры с ужасом замечают, что за витражами корабельного мостика виднеется лишь полотно бескрайнего космоса. "Плач королевы" незаметно растаял во тьме, забрав с собой целый отряд разведки.

languages.text: A sharp intake of breath is heard over the vox, as if the operator is going to say something... but nothing happens. The transmission is filled with lingering silence. Then — someone's frantic sniffling. A blood-curdling scream. And heavy static. Then the officers aboard the flagship come to the horrifying realisation that the only thing left behind the stained-glass windows of the captain's bridge is the uncaring vastness of space. The Queen's Lament has disappeared unnoticed, taking the entire scouting party with it.

traits.locale_text: A sharp intake of breath is heard over the vox, as if the operator is going to say something... but nothing happens. The transmission is filled with lingering silence. Then — someone's frantic sniffling. A blood-curdling scream. And heavy static. Then the officers aboard your flagship come to the horrifying realisation that the only thing left behind the stained-glass windows of the captain's bridge is the uncaring vastness of space. Queen's Lament has disappeared unnoticed, taking the entire scouting party with it.

languages.text: 音阵装置中传来了一声急促的吸气声，操作员似乎想说些什么，但却什么声音都没有传来，只有挥之不去的沉默。在这之后，突然有人疯狂地抽泣起来，随后传来了令人毛骨悚然的尖叫圣，以及沉重的静电声。在那之后，旗舰上的军官们惊恐地意识道，舰桥的彩色玻璃窗后面只剩下了浩瀚无垠的虚空。女王挽歌号悄无声息地消失了，整支侦察队也跟着不见了。
languages.original_text: A sharp intake of breath is heard over the vox, as if the operator is going to say something... but nothing happens. The transmission is filled with lingering silence. Then — someone's frantic sniffling. A blood-curdling scream. And heavy static. Then the officers aboard the flagship come to the horrifying realisation that the only thing left behind the stained-glass windows of the captain's bridge is the uncaring vastness of space. The Queen's Lament has disappeared unnoticed, taking the entire scouting party with it.

traits.locale_text: 音阵装置中传来了一声急促的吸气声，操作员似乎想说些什么，但却什么声音都没有传来，只有挥之不去的沉默。在这之后，突然有人疯狂地抽泣起来，随后传来了令人毛骨悚然的尖叫圣，以及沉重的静电声。在那之后，旗舰上的军官们惊恐地意识道，舰桥的彩色玻璃窗后面只剩下了浩瀚无垠的虚空。女王挽歌号悄无声息地消失了，整支侦察队也跟着不见了。
音阵装置中传来了一声急促的吸气声，操作员似乎想说些什么，但却什么声音都没有传来，只有挥之不去的沉默。在这之后，突然有人疯狂地抽泣起来，随后传来了令人毛骨悚然的尖叫圣，以及沉重的静电声。在那之后，旗舰上的军官们惊恐地意识道，舰桥的彩色玻璃窗后面只剩下了浩瀚无垠的虚空。女王挽歌号悄无声息地消失了，整支侦察队也跟着不见了。

languages.text: まるでオペレーターが何か言おうとしているかのように、鋭く息を吸い込む音がヴォクスから聞こえる…が、何も起こらない。送信は余韻の残る静寂に包まれる。突然…誰かが鼻をすする大きな音がし、血も凍るような悲鳴があがる。そして大きな雑音。旗艦に乗っていた士官たちは、船長のブリッジのステンドグラス窓の向こうには、無慈悲で広大な宇宙のみが広がっているという恐ろしい現実に気づく。女王の挽歌号は、偵察隊全員もろとも、いつの間にか姿を消した。
languages.original_text: A sharp intake of breath is heard over the vox, as if the operator is going to say something... but nothing happens. The transmission is filled with lingering silence. Then — someone's frantic sniffling. A blood-curdling scream. And heavy static. Then the officers aboard the flagship come to the horrifying realisation that the only thing left behind the stained-glass windows of the captain's bridge is the uncaring vastness of space. The Queen's Lament has disappeared unnoticed, taking the entire scouting party with it.

まるでオペレーターが何か言おうとしているかのように、鋭く息を吸い込む音がヴォクスから聞こえる…が、何も起こらない。送信は余韻の残る静寂に包まれる。突然…誰かが鼻をすする大きな音がし、血も凍るような悲鳴があがる。そして大きな雑音。旗艦に乗っていた士官たちは、船長のブリッジのステンドグラス窓の向こうには、無慈悲で広大な宇宙のみが広がっているという恐ろしい現実に気づく。女王の挽歌号は、偵察隊全員もろとも、いつの間にか姿を消した。

languages.text: Se oye una respiración agitada por el voco, como si el operador fuera a decir algo... pero no pasa nada. La transmisión se llena de un silencio profundo. Luego se oye la respiración agitada de alguien. Un grito que hiela la sangre. Y una fuerte estática. Los oficiales a bordo de la nave insignia se dan cuenta de que lo único que queda tras las vidrieras del puente de mando es la inmensidad del espacio. El Lamento de la Reina ha desaparecido sin dejar rastro, llevándose consigo a todo el equipo de exploración.
languages.original_text: A sharp intake of breath is heard over the vox, as if the operator is going to say something... but nothing happens. The transmission is filled with lingering silence. Then — someone's frantic sniffling. A blood-curdling scream. And heavy static. Then the officers aboard the flagship come to the horrifying realisation that the only thing left behind the stained-glass windows of the captain's bridge is the uncaring vastness of space. The Queen's Lament has disappeared unnoticed, taking the entire scouting party with it.

traits.locale_text: Se oye una respiración agitada por el voco, como si el operador fuera a decir algo... pero no pasa nada. La transmisión se llena de un silencio profundo. Luego se oye la respiración agitada de alguien. Un grito que hiela la sangre. Y una fuerte estática. Los oficiales a bordo de la {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}nave insignia{/g} se dan cuenta de que lo único que queda tras las vidrieras del puente de mando es la inmensidad del espacio. El Lamento de la Reina ha desaparecido sin dejar rastro, llevándose consigo a todo el equipo de exploración.

languages.text: Ein scharfes Einatmen ertönt aus dem Vox, als würde der Offizier etwas sagen wollen ... doch nichts geschieht. Die Übertragung ist von einem anhaltenden Schweigen erfüllt. Dann ... ein hektisches Schniefen. Ein markerschütternder Schrei. Und schweres Rauschen. Dann kommt den Offizieren an Bord des Flaggschiffs die grauenhafte Erkenntnis, dass vor den Buntglasfenstern der Brücke nur noch die gnadenlose Weite des Alls zu sehen ist. Die Klage der Königin ist unbemerkt verschwunden und hat den gesamten Erkundungstrupp mitgenommen.
languages.original_text: A sharp intake of breath is heard over the vox, as if the operator is going to say something... but nothing happens. The transmission is filled with lingering silence. Then — someone's frantic sniffling. A blood-curdling scream. And heavy static. Then the officers aboard the flagship come to the horrifying realisation that the only thing left behind the stained-glass windows of the captain's bridge is the uncaring vastness of space. The Queen's Lament has disappeared unnoticed, taking the entire scouting party with it.

Dann ... ein hektisches Schniefen. Ein markerschütternder Schrei. Und schweres Rauschen. Ein scharfes Einatmen ertönt aus dem Vox, als würde der Offizier etwas sagen wollen ... doch nichts geschieht. Die Übertragung ist von einem anhaltenden Schweigen erfüllt. Dann ... ein hektisches Schniefen. Ein markerschütternder Schrei. Und schweres Rauschen. Dann kommt den Offizieren an Bord deines Flaggschiffs die grauenhafte Erkenntnis, dass vor den Buntglasfenstern der Brücke nur noch die gnadenlose Weite des Alls zu sehen ist. Die Klage der Königin ist unbemerkt verschwunden und hat den gesamten Erkundungstrupp mitgenommen.

languages.text: Une brusque inspiration se fait entendre sur le canal-vox, comme si l'opérateur s'apprêtait à prendre la parole... puis plus rien. L'instant d'après, le silence pesant est interrompu par des reniflements frénétiques suivis d'un cri à glacer le sang et d'interférences assourdissantes. C'est alors que les officiers à bord du vaisseau amiral s'aperçoivent avec horreur qu'il ne reste plus rien de l'autre côté des baies vitrées de la passerelle à part l'immensité du vide intersidéral. La Complainte de la Reine s'est volatilisée sans crier gare, emportant avec elle l'ensemble de l'équipe de reconnaissance.
languages.original_text: A sharp intake of breath is heard over the vox, as if the operator is going to say something... but nothing happens. The transmission is filled with lingering silence. Then — someone's frantic sniffling. A blood-curdling scream. And heavy static. Then the officers aboard the flagship come to the horrifying realisation that the only thing left behind the stained-glass windows of the captain's bridge is the uncaring vastness of space. The Queen's Lament has disappeared unnoticed, taking the entire scouting party with it.

L'instant d'après, le silence pesant est interrompu par des reniflements frénétiques suivis d'un cri à glacer le sang et d'interférences assourdissantes. La Complainte de la Reine s'est volatilisée sans crier gare, emportant avec elle l'ensemble de l'équipe de reconnaissance.

languages.text: Vokstan keskin bir nefes sesi duyulur, sanki operatör bir şey söyleyecek... Fakat hiçbir şey olmuyor. Yayın, süregelen bir sessizlikle doluyor. Sonra birinin telaşlı hıçkırıkları. Kan dondurucu bir çığlık. Ardından yoğun bir parazit. Sancak gemisinin subayları, kaptan köprüsünün vitraylarının ötesinde yalnızca uzayın umursamaz enginliğinin kaldığını dehşet içinde fark ediyor. Kraliçenin Matemi, fark edilmeden kayboluyor ve tüm keşif erlerini de beraberinde götürüyor.
languages.original_text: A sharp intake of breath is heard over the vox, as if the operator is going to say something... but nothing happens. The transmission is filled with lingering silence. Then — someone's frantic sniffling. A blood-curdling scream. And heavy static. Then the officers aboard the flagship come to the horrifying realisation that the only thing left behind the stained-glass windows of the captain's bridge is the uncaring vastness of space.
